item.description:
OK we are going to have dinner starting at 6:30 and then catch the 8:20 movie.  We can meet at the place to eat first.  I would like to get to the movies around 8:00 so i can meet anyone who cannot make it to dinner. 

 

As for dinner, i would like to go to Parma.  Does anyone object? If not we could meet there at 6:30.  BTW Parma Pizzaria is in the Big Y plaza across the street from the AMC movie theater, right next to starbucks.   

Contact Information for Parma. 

http://parmapizzact.com/
860-747-9944
275F New Britain Ave
Plainville, CT 06062-2013

 

Again m﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿y cell is 860-655-3756, if you need to get in touch with me.

 

Bad Teacher

A comedy centered around a foul-mouthed, junior high teacher who, after being dumped by her sugar daddy, begins to woo a colleague -- a move that pits her against a well-loved teacher. 
 

Cast: Cameron Diaz, Justin Timberlake, Jason Segel, Lucy Punch, John Michael Higgins

www.areyouabadteacher.com
item.how_to_find_us: My cell is 860-655-3756, if you need to get in touch with me. Also I will be waiting in the lobby of the movies near the ticket kiosks to the right of the entrance from 8:00ish to 8:15.
item.name: Bad Teacher?
